Crimes.Crime_Name: Persecution as a Crime Against Humanity
Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Involved: Crimes against humanity under international law, as recognized in Canadian law
Crimes.Outcome: Found on balance of probabilities that Rogan committed persecution as a crime against humanity
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Ethnic-based mistreatment of Muslim prisoners in Bileća detention facilities
Crimes.Legal_Framework: Canadian Citizenship Act, international humanitarian law
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Sufficient evidence to establish knowledge and participation in systematic attack
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Rogan obtained citizenship through false representation and concealment
Crimes.Institutional_Action: Federal Court review and revocation of citizenship
Crimes.Government_Body_or_Authority: Federal Court of Canada, Minister of Immigration
Crimes.Jurisdiction: Canada (federal level), conduct occurred in Bosnia-Herzegovina
Crimes.Nature_of_Participation: Direct participation in beatings and psychological abuse
Crimes.Personal_Data_Implicated: Employment history, role in conflict, criminal conduct
Crimes.Legal_Statute: Crimes against humanity provisions under customary international law
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Participation in systemic abuse of Muslim detainees
Crimes.Role_of_Person: Reserve police officer and prison guard
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Knowledge of participation in widespread/systematic attack
Crimes.Credibility: Credible eyewitness and documentary evidence accepted by court
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section of Citizenship Act regarding false representation
Crimes.Perpetrator_Entity: Individual (Branko Rogan) acting within state-affiliated detention system
Crimes.Legal_Basis: International law incorporated into domestic legal framework

Crimes.Legal_Standard: Material concealment leading to acquisition of citizenship
Crimes.Authority: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship

Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Involvement in crimes against humanity and failure to disclose

Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Notice and opportunity to respond provided
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Inconsistent statements and omissions undermined credibility
Crimes.Omission_Type: Concealment of wartime role and criminal conduct
